channel.title: Site on C. Ager
channel.description: Recent content in Site on C. Ager

item.title: Mass editing tags
item.description:
Having read some about the blogdown package I thought I could cleanup my site some more.

I came up with some scripts to clean up tags.

item.title: Layout changes
item.description: I played around removing all the JavaScript dependencies of the hugo-academic template. I feel bootstrap and jQuery have little reason to be on such a simple site. By now I think I deviated from the original theme to no longer need it in the powered by section. Anyway should you note something amiss - let me know.

item.title: Github pages
item.description: Now this site is on github pages. I had already repos on github for some time and trusted it - only private repos I keep on other places. But mostly I was missing some features a bplaced so now the move. Mostly I like that I can now post new content via git so I just need to transfer new posts and not the whole site. That now the site is https secured is a nice boon.

item.title: Move from uibk home pages
item.description: So the university is shutting down the personal home pages. Well it’s no big deal, though it was helpful that there was a server that would accept ssh connections. Now I’m experimenting with the free tier of bplaced. Which is basic but should suffice for my plain text pages.
